This calculator app is an amazing app. Believe me i installed and compared several calculator apps present in the google app store. I tested each one of them according to my requirements but all apps failed except this calculator app N-CALC. Highly recommended.   These are the reasons among all the ...Full ReviewThis calculator app is an amazing app. Believe me i installed and compared several calculator apps present in the google app store. I tested each one of them according to my requirements but all apps failed except this calculator app N-CALC. Highly recommended.   These are the reasons among all the other reasons why i like this app:  1. It gives u maximum number of digits in the answer no matter how long your calculation is.  2. Maximum number of digits after decimal.  3. No lag or hang.  4. Very smooth and responsive

the best scientific calculator today. other apps just try to copy the feature of physical calculator but this one does better as it synthesize the advantage of a touch screen to the app. one thing I wish you will change in the next update is the display of the (x10) button. can you make the x10 in s...Full Reviewthe best scientific calculator today. other apps just try to copy the feature of physical calculator but this one does better as it synthesize the advantage of a touch screen to the app. one thing I wish you will change in the next update is the display of the (x10) button. can you make the x10 in subscript while the following factor in superscript? do you consider writing a financial calculator app? I'm looking forward to that :)
